course.subject: BIEN
course.name: Academic and Professional Development I
course.description: For students in the Bioengineering major. This course is designed to provide academic advising to students, to enhance their understanding of the bioengineering field, to encourage them to pursue co-curricular learning opportunities available to them, and to improve their communication skills. Students are required to attend discussion sessions with advisors and fellow students and selected workshops and seminars. Graded P or F.

reviews.author: Keju
reviews.comment_content: In-class talks about career center and internships, plant/company visits to HKSTP and other companies.
reviews.comment_teaching: Classes are filled with seminars and plant/company visits, which are mostly informational. Adequate time and content.
reviews.comment_grading: P/F grading, as long as you attend 80% of the classes (including visits, which are at the same time as the class anyway) and do all the assignments properly you'll get full credit and pass. You'll fail if you fail to do any of them though.
reviews.comment_workload:
For the whole semester, you have to prepare:
1 Reflection statement (~150 words)
1 Dream CV
1 3-year university plan

They're light considering the deadline is at the end of the term's classes (before finals though) and you get 1 credit towards your university credit requirement (if you even actually need the 1 credit).
